headline: Best Defensive Stocks To Balance Tech Sector Volatility
summary: The best defensive stocks to balance risk and return combine durable cash flows, essential services, and key growth metrics. Click here to see the top 4 stocks.

headline: 2 Reasons to Watch VRTX and 1 to Stay Cautious
summary: Since June 2025, Vertex Pharmaceuticals has been in a holding pattern, posting a small return of 0.5% while floating around $450.68. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 13.6% gain during that period.
